p: Additionally, for studies of targeted changes in the structure of corresponding dicationic compound 10, which was found to be more active for DNA delivery among the tested 1,4-DHP amphiphiles [ 13, 15, 28], 1,1′,1 ″,1‴-((1,4-phenylenebis(3,5-bis((dodecyloxy)carbonyl)-1,4-dihydropyridine-4,2,6-triyl))tetrakis(methylene))tetrakis(pyridin-1-ium) tetrabromide ( 26) was synthesized as a double or a “dimeric” molecule of compound 10 and 1,1′-((3,5-bis(dodecyloxycarbonyl)-4-phenylpyridine-2,6-diyl)bis(methylene))-bis(pyridin-1-ium)dibromide ( 27) was prepared in accordance with what was reported in [ 14] as the oxidized form of compound 10. For evaluation of the anion influence on cytotoxicity, 1,1′-((3,5-bis((dodecyloxy)carbonyl)-4-phenyl-1,4-dihydropyridine-2,6-diyl)bis(methylene))bis(pyridin-1-ium) ditetrafluoroborate ( 11) was synthesized from compound 10 after treating with NH 4BF 4.
